(n, q) = map(int, input().split())
list1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
list2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
for i in range(q):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    ans = 0
    for i in range(a - 1, b):
        k = list1[i] * list2[i]
        ans += k
    print(ans)

(n, q) = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))
s = 0
cum = [0]
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    s += a[i - 1] * b[i - 1]
    cum.append(s)
for i in range(q):
    (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
    print(cum[r] - cum[l - 1])

n_battles = input().split(' ')
n_soilders = input().split(' ')
stegth = input().split(' ')
for i in range(int(n_battles[1])):
    battle_nums = input().split(' ')
    gain = 0
    for j in range(int(battle_nums[0]), int(battle_nums[1]) + 1):
        gain += int(stegth[j - 1]) * int(n_soilders[j - 1])
    print(gain)

(N, Q) = map(int, input().split(' '))
A = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
B = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
for i in range(Q):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    j = a
    y = 0
    while a <= j <= b:
        x = A[j - 1] * B[j - 1]
        y += x
        j += 1
    print(y)

b = list(map(int, input().split()))
for i in range(q):
    ans = 0
    tot = 0
    (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
    if l == r:
        tot = a[l - 1] * b[l - 1]

        for k in range(l, r + 1, 1):
            ans = a[k - 1] * b[k - 1]
            tot += ans
    print(tot)

    print(gain)
